summary:
I‚Äôm focused on working with multi-location businesses and creative agencies to help them streamline the way their marketing assets are localised across their entire organisation.

Marvia is an Amsterdam based tech company that‚Äôs currently partnered with several agencies and international businesses and is expanding those efforts in Europe and North America. 

Telling a brand‚Äôs story and guiding users to the right resources for a consistent experience is imperative in today‚Äôs world. Our tech allows corporate and creative marketing teams to maintain a single source of truth while maximising productivity and brand consistency.

Teams can also use our tech to create print and digital materials for all channels in minutes with zero design experience while also being able to find, organise, and share all digital brand assets without wasting time.

Specialties:

- Brand management and corporate identity
- Co Branding
- Global / Local marketing automation
- Employee Activation

If you‚Äôre curious to see our platform in action or chat about a potential collaboration - then let‚Äôs get in touch! 

Contact: ‚úâ  ray@getmarvia.com | www.getmarvia.com | ‚úÜ +31 (0)6 40609484 |

experience.description:

experience.description: Als specialist in arbeid & techniek bij Techsharks Projecten ben ik als regiomanager verantwoordelijk geweest voor de Regio Midden-West & Oost (Tilburg/Eindhoven/Arnhem). Hierbij lag mijn focus op allround (project)engineers die zich continue willen ontwikkelen in de procesindustrie. Uitdaging, dynamisch, zelfstandig, zij die dagelijks het verschil willen maken!  Samen op zoek naar de juiste oplossing waarbij we het maximale resultaat samen gaan bereiken middels een persoonlijke samenwerking. Dagelijks werkte ik samen met uiteenlopende bedrijven in de procesindustrie.
experience.title: Region Manager Mid-West

experience.description: In de 360 graden rol van Sales & Recruitment Consultant Industrie ben ik verantwoordelijk geweest voor het rekruten van technisch professionals, acquisitie van new business (en uitbouwen van bestaande klanten), relatie management. Binnen de branche industrie had ik een specialisme; Industriele automatisering. De focusprofielen waar ik mij hard voor maakte waren; PLC, SCADA, DCS, Electrical, System- en integratie engineers. Daarnaast op teken/hardware (AutoCAD, CAD-Systemen en Eplan) en embedded software profielen (C, C++, .NET, C#).
experience.title: Business Consultant Engineering

projects.description:
Together with five other team members during the second year of my study Commercial Economics, I wrote an innovation plan for Punt Extra. This organization wanted to develop a new innovative service for the target group of women under 35 with the theme of home and family.

This target is achieved by qualitative and quantitative research, to investigated the needs of this target group. After that we had a creativity session with the team for a new innovation service concept.
projects.title: Innovation plan Punt Extra

projects.description: The goal of this export project was to solve a problem that ALT Montage B.V. had in 2013. ALT Montage B.V. has predicted a shrink in the Dutch market while it is looking to expand her market. The most favourable option for ALT Montage B.V. was to export their products. Therefore the project group made a international market selection model to analyse the market potential in foreign countries. The project group visited Germany for 5 days to do further research (networking, creating business relations).
projects.title: Exportplan ALT Montage
